author: heikki.ruhanen
title: Recruitment utilising Atala PRISM
description: Obtaining valid certifications for job recruitment is a major obstacle in labor markets of developing countries
solution: Utilizing Atala PRISM DID in Fairway SaaS system to create, record and leverage contracts and documents related to employment and job market
experience: Fairway (Company behind the submission) is creating the SaaS already in Ethiopia and plans to integrate Atala PRISM DID to Fairway.
